NEW DELHI: Shares of Berger Paints (India) Ltd. traded 0.99 per cent up in Monday's trade at 12:13PM (IST). Around 308,498 shares changed hands on the counter.

articles.title: Bill Gates remembers Nelson Mandela’s legacy, shares his favourite picture of the icon with Gates Sr
